Structs/PresentrShadow.html.abstract: Helper struct that represents the shadow properties

Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.name: finishedUpdatingProgress(forRing:)
Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.abstract: Delegate call back, called when progress ring is done animating for current value

Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.name: didUpdateProgressValue(to:)
Protocols/UICircularProgressRingDelegate.abstract: This method is called whenever the value is updated, this means during animation this method will be called in real time.

Protocols/PresentrDelegate.html#/c:@M@MT.name: presentrShouldDismiss(keyboardShowing:)
Protocols/PresentrDelegate.html#/c:@M@MT.abstract: Asks the delegate if it should dismiss the presented controller on the tap of the outer chrome view.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerView(_:shouldHighlightItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Asks the delegate if the item should be highlighted during tracking.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerView(_:didHighlightItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate that the item at the specified index was highlighted.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerView(_:shouldSelectItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Asks the delegate if the specified item should be selected.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerView(_:didSelectItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate that the item at the specified index was selected.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerView(_:willDisplay:forItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified cell is about to be displayed in the pager view.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerView(_:didEndDisplaying:forItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified cell was removed from the pager view.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerViewWillBeginDragging(_:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate when the pager view is about to start scrolling the content.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerViewWillEndDragging(_:targetIndex:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate when the user finishes scrolling the content.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerViewDidScroll(_:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate when the user scrolls the content view within the receiver.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerViewDidEndScrollAnimation(_:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate when a scrolling animation in the pager view concludes.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: pagerViewDidEndDecelerating(_:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Tells the delegate that the pager view has ended decelerating the scrolling movement.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDataSource.html#/c:.name: numberOfItems(in:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Asks your data source object for the number of items in the pager view.

Protocols/FSPagerViewDataSource.html#/c:.name: pagerView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Protocols/FSPagerViewDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Asks your data source object for the cell that corresponds to the specified item in the pager view.

Protocols/ESRefreshProtocol.html#/s:9MTT.name: refresh(view:progressDidChange:)
Protocols/ESRefreshProtocol.html#/s:9MTT.abstract: Pulling status callback , progress is the percentage of the current offset with trigger, and avoid doing too many tasks in this process so as not to affect the fluency.

Protocols/BWWalkthroughPage.html#/c:@M@M.name: walkthroughDidScroll(to:offset:)
Protocols/BWWalkthroughPage.html#/c:@M@M.abstract: While sliding to the next slide (from right to left), the current slide changes its offset from 1.0 to 2.0 while the next slide changes it from 0.0 to 1.0

Protocols/PresentrDelegate.html.name: PresentrDelegate
Protocols/PresentrDelegate.html.abstract: The ‘PresentrDelegate’ protocol defines methods that you use to respond to changes from the ‘PresentrController’. All of the methods of this protocol are optional.

Enums/AlertActionStyle.html.name: AlertActionStyle
Enums/AlertActionStyle.html.abstract: Describes the style for an action, that will be used to style a button in the alert controller.

Enums/ModalCenterPosition.html.name: ModalCenterPosition
Enums/ModalCenterPosition.html.abstract: Describes the presented presented view controller’s center position. It is meant to be non-specific, but we can use the ‘calculatePoint’ method when we want to calculate the exact point by passing in the ‘containerBounds’ rect that only the presentation controller should be aware of.

Enums/ModalSize.html.name: ModalSize
Enums/ModalSize.html.abstract: Descibes a presented modal’s size dimension (width or height). It is meant to be non-specific, but the exact position can be calculated by calling the ‘calculate’ methods, passing in the ‘parentSize’ which only the Presentation Controller should be aware of.

Enums/PresentationType.html.name: PresentationType
Enums/PresentationType.html.abstract: Basic Presentr type. Its job is to describe the ‘type’ of presentation. The type describes the size and position of the presented view controller.

Enums/TransitionType.html.name: TransitionType
Enums/TransitionType.html.abstract: Describes the transition animation for presenting the view controller.

Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.name: transform(containerFrame:finalFrame:)
Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.abstract: For simple transitions, override this method to calculate an initial frame for the animation. For more complex animations override beforeAnimation & performAnimation. Only override this method OR beforeAnimation & performAnimation. This method won’t even be called if you override beforeAnimation.

Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.name: beforeAnimation(using:)
Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.abstract: Actions to be performed in preparation, before an animation.

Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.name: performAnimation(using:)
Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.abstract: Actions to be performed for the animation.

Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.name: afterAnimation(using:)
Classes/PresentrAnimation.html#/s:9MTToo.abstract: Actions to be performed after the animation.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: presentationType
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: This must be set during initialization, but can be changed to reuse a Presentr object.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: transitionType
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: The type of transition animation to be used to present the view controller. This is optional, if not provided the default for each presentation type will be used.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: dismissTransitionType
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: The type of transition animation to be used to dismiss the view controller. This is optional, if not provided transitionType or default value will be used.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: roundCorners
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Should the presented controller have rounded corners. Each presentation type has its own default if nil.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: cornerRadius
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Radius of rounded corners for presented controller if roundCorners is true. Default is 4.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: dropShadow
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Shadow settings for presented controller.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: dismissOnTap
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Should the presented controller dismiss on background tap. Default is true.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: dismissOnSwipe
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Should the presented controller dismiss on Swipe inside the presented view controller. Default is false.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: dismissOnSwipeDirection
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: If dismissOnSwipe is true, the direction for the swipe. Default depends on presentation type.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: dismissAnimated
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Should the presented controller use animation when dismiss on background tap or swipe. Default is true.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: backgroundColor
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Color of the background. Default is Black.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: backgroundOpacity
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Opacity of the background. Default is 0.7.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: blurBackground
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Should the presented controller blur the background. Default is false.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: blurStyle
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: The type of blur to be applied to the background. Ignored if blurBackground is set to false. Default is Dark.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: customBackgroundView
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: A custom background view to be added on top of the regular background view.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: keyboardTranslationType
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: How the presented view controller should respond to keyboard presentation.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: shouldIgnoreTapOutsideContext
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: When a ViewController for context is set this handles what happens to a tap when it is outside the context. True will ignore tap and pass the tap to the background controller, false will handle the tap and dismiss the presented controller. Default is false.

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: viewControllerForContext
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Uses the ViewController’s frame as context for the presentation. Imitates UIModalPresentation.currentContext

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: init(presentationType:)
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.name: alertViewController(title:body:)
Classes/Presentr.html#/s:9MTToolKit8Pres.abstract: Public helper class method for creating and configuring an instance of the ‘AlertViewController’

Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.name: titleText
Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.abstract: Text that will be used as the title for the alert

Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.name: bodyText
Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.abstract: Text that will be used as the body for the alert

Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.name: autoDismiss
Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.abstract: If set to false, alert wont auto-dismiss the controller when an action is clicked. Dismissal will be up to the action’s handler. Default is true.

Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.name: dismissAnimated
Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.abstract: If autoDismiss is set to true, then set this property if you want the dismissal to be animated. Default is true.

Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.name: addAction(_:)
Classes/AlertViewController.html#/s:9MTT.abstract: Adds an ‘AlertAction’ to the alert controller. There can be maximum 2 actions. Any more will be ignored. The order is important.

Classes/FSPagerViewCell.html#/c:@M@MTToo.name: textLabel
Classes/FSPagerViewCell.html#/c:@M@MTToo.abstract: Returns the label used for the main textual content of the pager view cell.

Classes/FSPagerViewCell.html#/c:@M@MTToo.name: imageView
Classes/FSPagerViewCell.html#/c:@M@MTToo.abstract: Returns the image view of the pager view cell. Default is nil.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.name: scrollDirection
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.abstract: The scroll direction of the pager view. Default is horizontal.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: automaticSlidingInterval
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: The time interval of automatic sliding. 0 means disabling automatic sliding. Default is 0.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: interitemSpacing
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: The spacing to use between items in the pager view. Default is 0.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: itemSize
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: The item size of the pager view. .zero means always fill the bounds of the pager view. Default is .zero.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: isInfinite
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: A Boolean value indicates that whether the pager view has infinite items. Default is false.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: alwaysBounceHorizontal
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether bouncing always occurs when horizontal scrolling reaches the end of the content view.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: alwaysBounceVertical
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether bouncing always occurs when vertical scrolling reaches the end of the content view.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: backgroundView
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: The background view of the pager view.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.name: isTracking
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.abstract: Returns whether the user has touched the content to initiate scrolling.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: removesInfiniteLoopForSingleItem
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Remove the infinite loop if there is only one item. default is NO

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.name: scrollOffset
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.abstract: The percentage of x position at which the origin of the content view is offset from the origin of the pagerView view.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.name: panGestureRecognizer
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/s:9MTToolKit11.abstract: The underlying gesture recognizer for pan gestures.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: register(_:forCellWithReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Register a class for use in creating new pager view cells.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: register(_:forCellWithReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Register a nib file for use in creating new pager view cells.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: dequeueReusableCell(withReuseIdentifier:at:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Returns a reusable cell object located by its identifier

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: reloadData()
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Reloads all of the data for the collection view.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: selectItem(at:animated:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Selects the item at the specified index and optionally scrolls it into view.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: deselectItem(at:animated:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Deselects the item at the specified index.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: scrollToItem(at:animated:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Scrolls the pager view contents until the specified item is visible.

Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.name: index(for:)
Classes/FSPagerView.html#/c:@M@MTToolKit.abstract: Returns the index of the specified cell.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: numberOfPages
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: The number of page indicators of the page control. Default is 0.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: currentPage
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: The current page, highlighted by the page control. Default is 0.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: itemSpacing
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: The spacing to use of page indicators in the page control.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: interitemSpacing
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: The spacing to use between page indicators in the page control.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: contentInsets
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: The distance that the page indicators is inset from the enclosing page control.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: contentHorizontalAlignment
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: The horizontal alignment of content within the control’s bounds. Default is center.

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: hidesForSinglePage
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: Hide the indicator if there is only one page. default is NO

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: setStrokeColor(_:for:)
Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.abstract: Sets the stroke color for page indicators to use for the specified state. (selected/normal).

Classes/FSPageControl.html#/c:@M@MTToolK.name: setFillColor(_:for:)
